mapper.select: SELECT b.extract_month FROM budget_extract_tax_handle_record b WHERE b.extract_month < #{extractBatch} AND b.is_cal_complete = 1 AND b.is_set_excess_complete = 1 AND b.is_personality_complete = 1 ORDER BY b.extract_month DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT bepd.id, bief.batch_no batch, bief.department_name firstDept, bief.province_or_region secondDept, bief.employee_job_num empNo, bief.employee_name empName, bepd.cur_extract 'extract', bief.account_name personalityName, if(bief.account_type=1,'个卡','公户') userType, bepd.receipt_sum receiptSum, bepd.extract_sum extractSum, bepd.cur_real_extract curExtract, bepd.salary_sum salarySum, bepd.cur_salary curSalary, bepd.welfare_sum welfareSum, bepd.cur_welfare curWelfare, bepd.personality_id personalityId, bepd.extract_sum+bepd.salary_sum+bepd.welfare_sum moneySum, bepd.cur_extract+bepd.cur_salary+bepd.cur_welfare curPaySum, bepd.remaining_invoices remainingInvoices, bepd.remaining_pay_limit_money remainingPayLimitMoney, bbu.`name` billingUnitName, bepd.pay_status payStatus, bepd.billing_unit_id billingUnitId, DATE_FORMAT(bepd.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') updateTime, DATE_FORMAT(bepd.operate_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') operateTime, bepd.is_send isSend FROM budget_extract_personality_pay_detail bepd LEFT JOIN budget_individual_employee_files bief ON bepd.personality_id = bief.id left join budget_billing_unit bbu on bbu.id = bepd.billing_unit_id WHERE 1=1
and bepd.extract_month = #{extractBatch}
and bief.batch_no like concat('%',#{params.batch},'%')
and bief.department_name like concat('%',#{params.firstDept},'%')
and bief.province_or_region like concat('%',#{params.secondDept},'%')
and bief.employee_job_num like concat('%',#{params.empNo},'%')
and bief.employee_name like concat('%',#{params.empName},'%')
and bief.account_name like concat('%',#{params.personalityName},'%')
and bief.account_type = #{params.userType}
and bepd.pay_status = #{params.payStatus}
and bbu.`name` like concat('%',#{params.unitName},'%')
and bepd.remaining_invoices like concat('%',#{params.remainingInvoices},'%')
and bepd.remaining_pay_limit_money like concat('%',#{params.remainingPayLimitMoney},'%')
and bepd.personality_id in
#{personalityId}
order by bief.employee_job_num,bbu.billingunittype desc
